description: This file defines the MockPlugin class which implements multiple interfaces for testing, including IPlugin, IIarm, IProc, IRBus, IRfc, IPowerManagerHal, and IMfr within the WPEFramework namespace. It declares mock methods for various subsystem interactions such as IARM bus operations, process management, RBus, RFC parameters, power management, and MFR temperature control, along with associated data members and static callbacks.

classes.name: MockPlugin
classes.description: A mock implementation of a plugin class that implements multiple interfaces for testing purposes, providing mock methods for subsystem interactions related to IARM, Process, RBus, RFC, Power Management, and MFR.

methods.name: MockPlugin
methods.description: Constructor for the MockPlugin class.

methods.name: ~MockPlugin
methods.description: Destructor for the MockPlugin class.

methods.name: Initialize
methods.description: Initializes the plugin with the given shell service.

methods.name: Deinitialize
methods.description: Deinitializes the plugin with the given shell service.

methods.name: Information
methods.description: Returns information about the plugin.

methods.name: IARM_Bus_IsConnected
methods.description: Mock implementation to check if the IARM bus is connected.

methods.name: IARM_Bus_Init
methods.description: Mock implementation to initialize the IARM bus.

methods.name: IARM_Bus_Connect
methods.description: Mock implementation to connect the IARM bus.

methods.name: IARM_Bus_RegisterEventHandler
methods.description: Mock implementation to register an event handler with IARM.

methods.name: IARM_Bus_RemoveEventHandler
methods.description: Mock implementation to remove an event handler from IARM.

methods.name: IARM_Bus_Call
methods.description: Mock method to perform an IARM bus call.

methods.name: IARM_Bus_BroadcastEvent
methods.description: Mock method to broadcast an event via IARM.

methods.name: IARM_Bus_RegisterCall
methods.description: Mock method to register a call on the IARM bus.

methods.name: IARM_Bus_CallWithIPCTimeout
methods.description: Mock method to perform an IARM bus call with IPC timeout.

methods.name: Register
methods.description: Registers an IARM notification callback.

methods.name: Unregister
methods.description: Unregisters an IARM notification callback.

methods.name: sendNotificationIarm
methods.description: Static function to send an IARM notification.

methods.name: openproc
methods.description: Mock method to open a process.

methods.name: closeproc
methods.description: Mock method to close a process.

methods.name: readproc
methods.description: Mock method to read process info.

methods.name: rbus_close
methods.description: Mock method to close a RBus handle.

methods.name: getRFCParameter
methods.description: Mock method to get an RFC parameter.

methods.name: setRFCParameter
methods.description: Mock method to set an RFC parameter.

methods.name: getRFCErrorString
methods.description: Method to retrieve the last RFC error string.

methods.name: PLAT_INIT
methods.description: Mock method to initialize platform.

methods.description: Mock method to reset platform.

methods.name: PLAT_TERM
methods.description: Mock method to terminate platform.

methods.name: PLAT_DS_SetDeepSleep

methods.name: PLAT_DS_DeepSleepWakeup
methods.description: Mock method to wakeup from deep sleep.

methods.description: Mock method to get last wakeup key code.

methods.description: Mock method to terminate deep sleep.

methods.description: Mock method to get temperature thresholds for MFR.
